Events.Name: Team Xtreme - Faction Ladder Contest
Events.Description: Collect and spend Xtreme Ladders to earn up to 528,500 Winged Heart Coins!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Collect and spend Xtreme Ladders to earn up to 528,500 Winged Heart Coins!

Rewards.Reward: Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 1 Star Gold
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 2 Star Bronze
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 2 Star Silver
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 2 Star Gold
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 3 Star Bronze
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 3 Star Silver
Kane "The Devil's Favorite Demon" 3 Star Gold

Events.Name: Faarooq-Fest!
Events.Description: Work with your Faction to earn Faarooq Shards, Winged Heart Coins and other AWESOME prizes!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Work with your Faction to earn Faarooq Shards, Winged Heart Coins and other AWESOME prizes!

Methods.Description: Fight the Boss of the Faarooq-Fest Blitz with Faarooq "The Nation Leader"
Defeat all opponents in Normal Mode of the Faarooq-Fest Premium Gauntlet Blitz
Defeat all opponents in Hard Mode of the Faarooq-Fest Premium Gauntlet Blitz
Defeat all opponents in Hell Mode of the Faarooq-Fest Premium Gauntlet Blitz

Events.Name: TEAM XTREME SHOWDOWN FACTION CONTEST
Events.Description: COMPETE AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL! EQUIP AND UPGRADE THE SHOWDOWN PERKS IN YOUR ROSTER SCREEN!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Compete in the TEAM XTREME SHOWDOWN alongside your Faction to win 6 MILLION Coins, 26 4-Star Silver tokens, and much more!

Events.Name: Independence Week Faction Contest
Events.Description: Collect Independence Week Stars to earn AWESOME rewards including enough Shards to unlock Sgt. Slaughter "Sarge" at 3-Star Gold for your ENTIRE Faction!

Events.Name: Team Xtreme Solo Contest
Events.Description: Win AMAZING prizes in the month of JUNE!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Win AMAZING prizes in the month of JUNE!

Methods.Description: Increase the talent of Edge "Rated-R Superstar" by 1
Increase the talent of Kurt Angle "Intensity, Integrity, Intelligence" by 1

Events.Name: Team Xtreme TP Contest
Events.Description: Spend TP to win up to 139,980 Winged Heart Coins and  8 Rated-R Bags!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Spend TP to win up to 139,980 Winged Heart Coins and  8 Rated-R Bags!

Events.Name: TEAM XTREME SHOWDOWN SOLO CONTEST
Events.Description: COMPETE AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL! EQUIP AND UPGRADE THE SHOWDOWN PERKS IN YOUR ROSTER SCREEN!
Events.EventMarqueeText: Compete in the TEAM XTREME SHOWDOWN for a chance to win Erick Rowan "The Bludgeon Brothers" at 4-Star Bronze, Showdown Coins, Winged Heart Coins and much more!

Rewards.Reward: Erick Rowan "The Bludgeon Brothers" 4 Star Bronze
Erick Rowan "The Bludgeon Brothers" 3 Star Bronze
Erick Rowan "The Bludgeon Brothers" 2 Star Bronze

Events.Name: Weekend Warrior Event
Events.Description: Spend Cash for a chance at AMAZING prizes!

Rewards.Reward: Brock Lesnar "Next Big Thing" 4 Star Bronze
Brock Lesnar "Next Big Thing" 3 Star Gold
Brock Lesnar "Next Big Thing" 3 Star Silver
